name: World Uyghur Congress
goal: The World Uyghur Congress (WUC) is an international organization based in Munich, Germany, that represents the collective interest of the Uyghur people both in East Turkestan (also known as the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region, Peoples Republic of China ‘PRC’) and abroad. The main objective of WUC is to promote the right of the Uyghur people to use peaceful, nonviolent, and democratic means to determine the political future of East Turkestan.
interests: Culture, Development, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives: The WUC performs some lobbying activities in relation to the EU and European Parliament.
